travelData.name: Prague
travelData.htmlText: Can't decide what's Prague's defining quality... Their bubly spirit or their beer? Wait.

travelData.name: Vienna
travelData.htmlText: It does wait for you. But don't run to catch up, cause it's all about taking it slow here.

travelData.name: Budapest
travelData.htmlText: Two cities, one river, and how many hairy guys at one hot spring?

travelData.name: Valencia
travelData.htmlText: Birthplace of paella and the water gets you a bit tipsy.

travelData.name: Barcelona
travelData.htmlText: I know you heard of cryin at the club, but lost for 2 hours at the club? (GONE COVID)

travelData.name: Genova
travelData.htmlText: The Ligurian port city. Boxed wine tastes like $18 and costs $1.50 on the beach.

travelData.name: Tuscany
travelData.htmlText: Florence, Pisa, Lucca, Viareggio... and Montecatani Terme?

travelData.name: Tokyo
travelData.htmlText: Putting mall food back on the map since day one.

travelData.name: Osaka
travelData.htmlText: Like Tokyo, but if it lowkey loved fairs and hot topic.

travelData.name: Kyoto
travelData.htmlText: The old capital. Home to the thousand gates and a few chubby stone statues of babies.

travelData.name: New York
travelData.htmlText: Sure it's grungy, but hallal cart food in central park on a summer day?

travelData.name: Chicago
travelData.htmlText: Cold for most of the year, but best food in America for all of the year.
